00019 #ifndef __SHADER_H__
00020 #define __SHADER_H__
00021 
00022 #include "attribute.h"
00023 #include "kernel_types.h"
00024 
00025 #include "util_map.h"
00026 #include "util_param.h"
00027 #include "util_string.h"
00028 #include "util_types.h"

00030 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00031 
00032 class Device;
00033 class DeviceScene;
00034 class Mesh;
00035 class Progress;
00036 class Scene;
00037 class ShaderGraph;
00038 struct float3;
00039 
00040 /* Shader describing the appearance of a Mesh, Light or Background.
00041  *
00042  * While there is only a single shader graph, it has three outputs: surface,
00043  * volume and displacement, that the shader manager will compile and execute
00044  * separately. */
00045 
00046 class Shader {
00047 public:
00048     /* name */
00049     string name;
00050     int pass_id;
00051 
00052     /* shader graph */
00053     ShaderGraph *graph;
00054 
00055     /* shader graph with auto bump mapping included, we compile two shaders,
00056        with and without bump,  because the displacement method is a mesh
00057        level setting, so we need to handle both */
00058     ShaderGraph *graph_bump;
00059 
00060     /* sampling */
00061     bool sample_as_light;
00062     bool homogeneous_volume;
00063 
00064     /* synchronization */
00065     bool need_update;
00066     bool need_update_attributes;
00067 
00068     /* information about shader after compiling */
00069     bool has_surface;
00070     bool has_surface_emission;
00071     bool has_surface_transparent;
00072     bool has_volume;
00073     bool has_displacement;
00074 
00075     /* requested mesh attributes */
00076     AttributeRequestSet attributes;
00077 
00078     Shader();
00079     ~Shader();
00080 
00081     void set_graph(ShaderGraph *graph);
00082     void tag_update(Scene *scene);
00083 };
00084 
00085 /* Shader Manager virtual base class
00086  * 
00087  * From this the SVM and OSL shader managers are derived, that do the actual
00088  * shader compiling and device updating. */
00089 
00090 class ShaderManager {
00091 public:
00092     bool need_update;
00093 
00094     static ShaderManager *create(Scene *scene);
00095     virtual ~ShaderManager();
00096 
00097     /* device update */
00098     virtual void device_update(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene, Progress& progress) = 0;
00099     virtual void device_free(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene) = 0;
00100 
00101     void device_update_common(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene, Scene *scene, Progress& progress);
00102     void device_free_common(Device *device, DeviceScene *dscene);
00103 
00104     /* get globally unique id for a type of attribute */
00105     uint get_attribute_id(ustring name);
00106     uint get_attribute_id(Attribute::Standard std);
00107 
00108     /* get shader id for mesh faces */
00109     int get_shader_id(uint shader, Mesh *mesh = NULL, bool smooth = false);
00110 
00111     /* add default shaders to scene, to use as default for things that don't
00112        have any shader assigned explicitly */
00113     static void add_default(Scene *scene);
00114 
00115 protected:
00116     ShaderManager();
00117 
00118     typedef unordered_map<ustring, uint, ustringHash> AttributeIDMap;
00119     AttributeIDMap unique_attribute_id;
00120 };
00121 
00122 CCL_NAMESPACE_END

00124 #endif /* __SHADER_H__ */
